name: Upper Crust
description:
You are a geomancer exploring beneath the surface of the earth. To move forward in your journey, you will need to bribe the giants who guard your path.

Built for Ludum Dare 29 with Unity, 2D Toolkit, GIMP, Audacity, BFXR, Tiled map editor, UTiled, and a base code library.

Music available on Soundcloud.
